abstract.t: The Server Index Query (SIQ) protocol is intended to provide astandard means by which a mail exchange (MX) server can query one ormore external services for scoring based on facts or reputation of anIP/domain pair. This document specifies the communication protocolused to transmit the IP/domain query and return the query response.The implementation, correctness of results, and/or management of SIQservers is beyond the scope of this document.
